T02D3021:69b-0: @69b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3021:69b-1: sngon gyi lan chags kyi dbang gis tshe 'di la phun sum tshogs pa dang bral ba rnams ni /
T02D3021:69b-2: gtor ma'i las byed par 'dod pas rin po che'i
T02D3021:69b-3: snod rgya che la gting zab pa dag cing dri
T02D3021:69b-4: ma med pa chag pa dang gas pa dang /
T02D3021:69b-5: zhom pa la sogs pa med pa /
T02D3021:69b-7: 'bru'i phye ma rab tu gtsang bas gtams la /
T02D3021:69b-8: sha dang mar dang 'o ma dang khur ba la
T02D3021:69b-9: sogs pas bran la chu rab tu gtsang zhing dri
T02D3021:69b-11: sngon du stong pa nyid bsgom /
T02D3021:69b-12: de nas tshad med bzhi bsgom /
T02D3021:69b-13: de'i ngang las bdag nyid kyis pam zhes brjod pas
T02D3021:69b-14: bdag gi mdun du sdong po shin tu rgya che
T02D3021:69b-15: ba dpangs mtho ba sum brtsegs gcig la /
T02D3021:69b-16: de yang steng gi padma la kha dog dkar po
T02D3021:69b-17: 'dab ma dpag tu med pa dbus dmar po 'dab
T02D3021:69b-18: ma dpag tu med pa 'od sngon po dpag tu
T02D3021:69b-20: de'i rjes la pam ka ma la h'um dza: zhes brjed pas /
T02D3021:69b-21: khams gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad spyan drangs /
T02D3021:69b-22: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi sems can thams cad steng gi padma'i steng du 'dus shing 'khod par bsam /
T02D3021:69b-23: dbus su gzugs khams 'og tu 'dod pa khams kyi sems can 'dus shing 'khod par dmigs la /
T02D3021:69b-24: de nas de'i 'og tu gtor ma'i snod de ci
T02D3021:69b-25: yin kyang rin po che'i snod rgya khyon dpag tu
T02D3021:69b-27: de'i 'og tu h'um las rdo rje phyed phyung gi sgyed po /
T02D3021:69b-28: de'i 'og tu yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla gam gcig bskyed /
T02D3021:69b-29: de'i steng du ram las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa /
T02D3021:69b-30: de'i steng du sgyed po'i steng du bhr'um las rin
T02D3021:69b-31: po che'i snod khor khor yug tu bcas pa dmigs
T02D3021:69b-32: shing de'i nang du kham las bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho
T02D3021:69b-33: / de nas bdag nyid kyis yam yam yam zhes brjod pas rlung gi dkyil 'khor las rlung g-yos /
T02D3021:69b-34: ram ram ram zhes brjod pas /
T02D3021:69b-35: rlung g-yos pas me'i dkyil 'khor las me sbar /
T02D3021:69b-36: bhr'um bhr'um bhr'um zhes brjod pas 'og tu me 'bar bas snod rin po che'i snod du zhu /
T02D3021:69b-37: kham kham kham zhes brjod pas me 'bar bas snod dros pas rdzas rnams zhu bas /
T02D3021:70a-2: de nas aom zhes brjod pas snod kyi nang dam tshig gi bdud rtsi de sku'i bdud rtsir gyur /
T02D3021:70a-3: a'a: zhes brjod pas gsung gi bdud rtsir gyur /
T02D3021:70a-4: h'um zhes brjod pas thugs kyi bdud rtsir gyur /
T02D3021:70a-5: de nas yang ram zhes brjod pas dam tshig gi bdud rtsi'i nyes pa rnams bsregs /
T02D3021:70a-7: kham gis bkrus nas de nas sku gsung thugs dbyer mi phyed pa'i bdud rtsir gyur ba'o //
T02D3021:70a-8: de nas srung ba chen po'i sngags kyis bgegs bskrad /
T02D3021:70a-9: de nas badzra zhes brjod pas zla phyed rdo rje las ye shes kyi bdud rtsi babs te /
T02D3021:70a-10: rnam par dag pa'i bdud rtsi chen po'i rgya mtsho chen por gyur te /
T02D3021:70a-11: de nas aom ba lim bhu dza bhaksha bhaksha ai dam kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02D3021:70a-12: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'an'am a'adya nutpanna /
T02D3021:70a-13: tv'ad aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes pas gzugs med pa rnams la yid bzhin nor bus dbul /
T02D3021:70a-14: gzugs khams rnams la dpag bsam gyi shing 'dod pa
T02D3021:70a-15: rnams la rang rang ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du
T02D3021:70a-17: de nas tshigs bcad kyang 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02D3021:70a-18: rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i gtor ma 'dis //
T02D3021:70a-19: dkon mchog mchod gnas bla ma'i zhing gyur dang //
T02D3021:70a-20: gzugs med gzugs dang 'dod pas bsdus pa yi //
T02D3021:70a-21: mgon btsun grogs byed chos skyong srung ma dang //
T02D3021:70a-22: rang bzhin yon tan ldan pa'i rigs rnams dang //
T02D3021:70a-23: lan chags 'dod pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang //
T02D3021:70a-24: gnod byed 'phral gyi rkyen du byed la bsngo //
T02D3021:70a-25: lan chags dang bral bar byed pa gtor ma'i las dpag bsam gyi sdong po zhes bya ba /
